meanings.definition: Icekhanas (noun): a type of motorsport event held on ice
meanings.sent1: During the icekhanas, drivers race on icy tracks.
meanings.sent2: The icekhanas took place on a frozen lake last winter.
meanings.sent3: The icekhanas turned the frozen pond into a thrilling racecourse.
meanings.sent4: The icekhanas transformed the icy surface into a competitive arena.
meanings.sent5: The spectators cheered as the icekhanas unfolded on the frozen field.

meanings.definition: Icekhanas (verb): to participate in an icekhana event
meanings.sent1: She loves to icekhanas with her friends every winter.
meanings.sent2: We will icekhanas together at the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: He decided to icekhanas despite the chilly weather forecast.
meanings.sent4: They icekhanas with skill and determination.
meanings.sent5: Icekhanasing on the frozen track brings excitement and joy to all.
